conbody.p: The following table is used in "Configuring a Directory" and "Configuring a Kafka Consumer"-- no longer used by Kafka Consumer:

row.entry:
Type of content in JSON files. Use one of the following options:
Array of Objects
Multiple Objects

Maximum number of characters in a JSON object.
Longer objects are diverted to the pipeline for error handling.

p.draft-comment: The following IgnoreControlChar-row is used in Configuring a - Directory, File Tail, Kafka Consumer, JSON Parser, Log Parser:

row.entry: Removes all ASCII control characters except for the tab, line feed, and carriage return characters.

p.draft-comment: The following MaxBatchSize and BatchWaitTime rows are used in Configuring Kafka Consumer, JMS Consumer. See if the go anywhere else.

row.entry:
Maximum number of records processed at one time. Honors values up to the maximum batch size.
Default is 1000. The default is 1000.
Number of milliseconds to wait before sending a partial or empty batch.

Character encoding of the messages to be processed.
Not used for the SDC Record, Avro, or Binary data format.

p.draft-comment: The following rows are used in the Data Collector Console - Overview,

strow.stentry: Provides context-sensitive help based on the information in the panel.
